name: Lyrikline
tagline: As one of the items on the 'cool' to-do list during my pre-MBA break, I start an online place to translate contemporary poems into Chinese.
body:
# Intro
Apr 14th, 2016
As one of the items on the 'cool' to-do list during my pre-MBA break, I start an online place to translate contemporary poems into Chinese.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
